markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iron Fists](/Feats.aspx?ID=4513) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your fists have been forged by battle, your naturally tough skin and dense bone further hardened by conflict. Your fist unarmed attacks no longer have the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait and gain the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) weapon trait.
name: Iron Fists
